channel.title: Tensorflow on oneAPI Community Page
channel.description: Recent content in Tensorflow on oneAPI Community Page

item.title: Cardiovascular Risk Prediction oneAPI
item.description: Cardiovascular Risk prediction is crucial for improving health outcomes, saving lives, reducing healthcare costs, and promoting a healthier society.The leading cause of death in the developed world is heart disease. Therefore there needs to be work done to help prevent the risks of of having a heart attack or stroke.

item.title: Sign Langauge Translator oneAPI
item.description: We will develop a Sign Gesture Language Translator using MediaPipe and the Intel OneAPI Platform. The translator will be able to recognize sign gestures captured from a video stream and convert them into corresponding text or spoken language.

item.title: Diagnosify
item.description: Diagnosify is an innovative brain disease classification project designed to leverage the power of machine learning and IntelÂ® oneAPIs for accurate and efficient brain disease prediction.

item.title: Hias All oneAPI Classifier
item.description: A HIAS compatible Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia classifier trained using Intel Distribution for Python and Intel Optimized Tensorflow. Uses OpenVINO to deploy the model to a Raspberry Pi and Neural Compute Stick 2 for inference on the edge.

item.title: Smart Garbage Segregation
item.description: Image classification for recycling refers to the use of machine learning algorithms to automatically classify images of waste materials, such as plastic, paper, and metal, into their respective categories.
